item.title: [yneo] Painful Bond
item.description:
Instant

Draw two cards, then cards in your hand with mana value 3 or greater perpetually gain "When you cast this spell, you lose 1 life."

https://twitter.com/MTG_Arena/status/1503846001395830804

item.title: [yneo] Jukai Liberator
item.description:
Creature — Snake Ninja

Ninjutsu {1}{G}

Whenever Jukai Liberator deals combat damage to a player, choose land or nonland. Seek a permanent card of the chosen type.

https://twitter.com/ReidDuke/status/1503813866257539072

item.title: [yneo] Molten Impact
item.description:
Sorcery

Molten Impact deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If excess damage was dealt this way, when you cast your next instant or sorcery spell, Molten Impact deals damage equal to the excess to target creature or planeswalker.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zo4lmc-5ADg

item.title: [yneo] Consuming Oni
item.description:
Creature — Ogre Demon

Flying, Menace

At the beginning of your end step, a random nonland card in your hand perpetually gains "When you cast this spell, you lose 3 life."

https://twitter.com/NumotTheNummy/status/1503798740120866816

item.title: [yneo] Artillery Enthusiast
item.description:
Creature — Goblin Artificer

When Artillery Enthusiast enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, seek a card with mana value equal to that card's mana value.

https://twitter.com/TheOneJame/status/1503781302444728321

item.title: [yneo] Semblance Scanner
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Equipment Shapeshifter

Whenever Semblance Scanner or equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, if it's not a token, conjure a duplicate of it into your hand.

Reconfigure {1}

https://twitter.com/TaaliaVess/status/1503787218736926722

item.title: [yneo] Chronicler of Worship
item.description:
Creature — Human Monk

When Chronicler of Worship enters the battlefield, put a random Shrine card from among the top seven cards of your library into your hand. It perpetually gains "This spell costs {1} less to cast." Then shuffle.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

https://twitter.com/AKA_Syx/status/1503807615314317313

item.title: [yneo] Imperial Blademaster
item.description:
Creature — Human Samurai

Double strike

Whenever a Samurai or Warrior you control attacks alone, draft a card from Imperial Blademaster's spellbook.

https://twitter.com/LadyLavinias/status/1503774254352973829

item.title: [yneo] Inchblade Companion
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Equipment Insect

Equipped creature gets +1/+1.

Whenever Inchblade Companion becomes attached to a creature, create a token that's a copy of Inchblade Companion, except it doesn't have this ability. This ability triggers only once each turn.

https://twitter.com/Mengu09/status/1503721658183471112

item.title: [yneo] Forgeborn Phoenix
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Equipment Phoenix

Flying

Equipped creature has flying.

Whenever Forgeborn Phoenix or equipped creature dies, it perpetually gains "Whenever an equipped creature you control deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped."

https://twitter.com/crokeyz/status/1503648601771237378

item.title: [slx] Arvinox, the Mind Flail
item.description:
Legendary Enchantment Creature — Horror

Arvinox, the Mind Flail isn't a creature unless you control three or more permanents you don't own.

At the beginning of your end step, exile the bottom card of each opponent's library face down. For as long as those cards remain exiled, you may look at them, you may cast permanent spells from among them, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.

Enchantment

At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and a loyalty counter on each planeswalker you control.

item.title: [slx] Bjorna, Nightfall Alchemist
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human

{T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Bjorna, Nightfall Alchemist deals 1 damage to target creature. Goad that creature. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)

Friends forever (You can have two commanders if both have friends forever.)

item.title: [slx] Elmar, Ulvenwald Informant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human

Haste

Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, untap target creature, then investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

Friends forever (You can have two commanders if both have friends forever.)

item.title: [slx] Cecily, Haunted Mage
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Wizard

Your maximum hand size is eleven.

Whenever Cecily, Haunted Mage attacks, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. Then if you have eleven or more cards in your hand, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand without paying its mana cost.

Friends forever (You can have two commanders if both have friends forever.)

item.title: [slx] Othelm, Sigardian Outcast
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human

{2}, {T}: Choose target creature card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Return it to the battlefield tapped.

Friends forever (You can have two commanders if both have friends forever.)

item.title: [slx] Hargilde, Kindly Runechanter
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human

{T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.

Friends forever (You can have two commanders if both have friends forever.)

item.title: [slx] Wernog, Rider's Chaplain
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human

When Wernog, Rider's Chaplain enters or leaves the battlefield, each opponent may investigate. Each opponent who doesn't loses 1 life. You investigate X times, where X is one plus the number of opponents who investigated this way.

Friends forever (You can have two commanders if both have friends forever.)

item.title: [slx] Sophina, Spearsage Deserter
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Soldier

Menace

Whenever Sophina, Spearsage Deserter attacks, investigate once for each nontoken attacking creature.

Friends forever (You can have two commanders if both have friends forever.)
